title: I think Taliyah's theme is the first theme song I haven't gotten tired of
body:
Which is weird because usually after a week, they get stale. 


WHAT TRICKERY IS THIS, RITO????

replies.body: the spell worked!
you guys have had an excellent track record on music to be honest. Even songs I don't personally like a lot of people seem to love (URF login screen for example)
This song had replaced Braum as my number 2 favorite login music. Ekko still remains at the top!
you release the mp3 please? or i have to rip it off youtube ?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBYLZ5Q0CGk 

and

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UXNA8obNNEs

are my personal favorites
Agreed, agreed and agreed
I still sing Jinx's to myself sometimes XD Rito's music team is amazing

best.
song.
ever.

I normally get tired of playing a champion too much. {{champion:163}} is different. I played her soo damn much https://i.gyazo.com/d3861d72f2d7402ee34ce5aa0d60bd60.png

I also listen to the theme song quite often while playing her. It's so perfect, never getting tired. Thank you so much Riot{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
You have 224k mastery points with her in such a short time after her release. Damn I gotta respect that.

> [{quoted}](name=Snika76,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XuqnO0Ux,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-07-09T19:23:06.078+0000)
>
> You have 224k mastery points with her in such a short time after her release. Damn I gotta respect that.

237k now :D Thanks but Im only rank 9th in mastery points on taliyha in the world. Someone already has 322k which I totally respect
I feel the same way about Braum's theme.
Braum's theme is awesome. Super Galaxy Rumble, too, that whole login screen was amazing.

Started at Braum.
Nothing bested it yet.
I agree, but ekkos was awesome too
i enjoy it too
Get jinxed ;)
{{champion:134}} Hi.
how do you download those theme tho...
I felt the same about the Arcade theme, sometimes I wish there was a way to mod it permanently as my log in screen....or is there?
it's the first one that I actually disabled the login music
Dark Star Thresh got me there I think. As much as I loved logging in after just waking up or late at night to get bombarded by rather loud ominous noises :/

I am kind of curious why the Dark Star Thresh login screen was so short lived. I really liked that one.

Not that I don't like Taliyah. Her theme is beautiful as well. But it was a nice change of pace. :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8_OSWJeVTg0 is still my ringtone
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NSQZqVsaKWY is also pretty good
nice music
